title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, August 28, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss describes in brief some movements of the armies. He also discusses matters relating to a female relative, including her reception at her northern home, and her Confederate sweetheart.
keywords: Women, Home Front, Troop Movement, Church/Religious Activity, Military Strategy, Death/Casualties, Slavery, African Americans, Agriculture, Family, American Civil War
